BodyCopy.p: International Risk Management Institute, Inc. (IRMI), under the leadership of President and CEO Jack Gibson, significantly enhanced and expanded its information services to the risk management and captive insurance communities in 2014.

ul.li: Adding more than 50 KnowledgeBase supplements, ranging from 100 to 300 pages in length, to the IRMI risk and insurance library (available via IRMI Online and ReferenceConnect).
Acquiring Captive.com and substantially upgrading the site to be your go-to free source of information on the alternative risk transfer market.
Publishing 12 issues of Captive Insurance Company Reports, the first newsletter/journal covering the captive industry.
Adding four supplements to Risk Financing, the most comprehensive reference service available on risk finance, captives, and ART programs.
Publishing the third edition of Captives and the Management of Risk.
Hosting the second IRMI Energy Risk & Insurance Conference, attended by nearly 500 risk managers and insurance professionals.
Launching the online course catalog for the Agribusiness & Farm Insurance Specialist (AFIS) certification program and hosting three farm and agribusiness conferences.
Publishing the Quality Risk Management Fieldbook, a practical and proactive approach to lower the costs of risk and protect an organization's assets.
Maintaining the largest catalog of online P&C insurance continuing education courses available anywhere, updating the courses as needed.
Publishing 100+ Expert Commentary articles on the IRMI.com website, available at no cost.
Publishing 50 Reinsurance Cases Every Risk Professional Should Know, a free white paper available on IRMI.com and Captive.com.

Hosting three webinars available to you without charge (the archives are still available to you): "Cyber & Privacy Insurance Coverage Made Simple(r)," "What You Need To Know about the Current D&O Marketplace," and "Fracking and Farming."
Hosting the 34th IRMI Construction Risk Conference, attended by nearly 1,500 construction risk management and insurance pros.

BodyCopy.p: Your editors of Captive.com and Captive Wire are pleased to have joined the IRMI team in 2014! We encourage our readers to subscribe to the free IRMI Update newsletter to take advantage of the other services IRMI offers.
